speaker: char
text: Hello, it’s me again. Do you remember me?

speaker: char
text: People usually do remember me but I don’t want to make assumptions.

speaker: char
text: The date was… okay, thank you for asking. I didn’t really enjoy any of the activities we did together and our personalities didn’t mesh well to be completely honest.

speaker: char
text: But it could have been much worse, certainly. I don’t want to sound like I’m complaining.

speaker: char
text: I’d like to try this dating thing again and one of the things that went well was your makeup.

speaker: char
text: Do you think you could do a bit more than last time, would that be okay? I just really liked how I felt with the makeup on.
